1.content: ### Which types of issues happen most frequently?

3.title: Problems by Category
3.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize {problemCount = countDistinct(event.id), by:{event.category}}
| sort problemCount desc

4.content: ### How long does it take us to resolve issues?

5.title: Top 20 Problems by Event
5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize {problemCount = countDistinct(event.id), by:{event.name}}
| sort problemCount desc

6.title: Median Problem resolution Time
6.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| fieldsAdd  minutes_to_resolve, alias: `Median Minutes to Resolve`
| fieldsRemove minutes_to_resolve

7.title: Median Problem Resolution Time in Minutes
7.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| summarize median(minutes_to_resolve), alias:`MTTR`

8.content: ### Which problem types take the longest to resolve?

9.title: Median Problem resolution time by event category
9.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m), event.category}
| sort event.category desc

10.title: Median Problem Resolution Time by Event Category in Minutes

12.title: Most common Slowdown & Error root causes
12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND (event.category == "SLOWDOWN" OR event.category == "ERROR") AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count = countDistinct(event.id), by:{root_cause_entity_id}
| sort count desc

19.title: AVG Problem Resolution Time in Minutes
19.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=avg(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| summarize avg(minutes_to_resolve), alias:`ATTR`

20.title: AVG Problem Resolution Time by Event Category in Minutes

25.title: Most common Resource Contention root causes
25.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND (event.category == "RESOURCE_CONTENTION") AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count = countDistinct(event.id), by:{root_cause_entity_id}
| sort count desc

27.title: Most common Availability root causes
27.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "AVAILABILITY") AND dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count= countDistinct(event.id), by:{root_cause_entity_id}
| sort count desc
